relics.name: Ceramic Disc
relics.description: Gain 50 Gold whenever you kill more than one enemy in the same turn.
relics.flavorText: It seems ready to shatter at any moment.

relics.name: Credit Card
relics.description: Every 7th card reward has 4 additional cards to choose from.
relics.flavorText: Earn 57.142857142% cash back on each purchase!

relics.name: Toothpaste
relics.description: Whenever an enemy's HP drops below 40%, apply 1 Weak to them.
relics.flavorText: Minty fresh, it keeps enemies and cavities at bay.

relics.name: Bowl of Rice
relics.description: When adding cards to your deck, you may add a random upgraded Colorless card instead.
relics.flavorText: Upon closer inspection, each grain has been meticulously glued into place.

relics.name: Honing Steel
relics.description: Upon pickup, increase the damage of all Attacks in your deck by 2.
relics.flavorText: Keep your blade sharp, and your mind sharper.

relics.name: Safety Bubble
relics.description: At the end of your turn, gain 1 Block for each time you've been attacked this combat.
relics.flavorText: Each time it's popped, it comes back stronger.

relics.name: Golden Boot
relics.description: For every 75 gold you gain, upgrade a random card in your deck. Prevents The Boot from spawning.

relics.name: Pandora's Shoebox
relics.description: At the start of each combat, Transform all basic strikes and defends in your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Curiosity transforms the mundane into the extraordinary.

relics.name: Party Bomb
relics.description: Usable once per combat. Click button to write a word containing the group of 3 letters indicated that appears anywhere in the base game. If correct, activate The Bomb. Otherwise, reduce the counter by 1. When it reaches 0, this explodes.

relics.name: Demonic Pact
relics.description: Whenever you play an Attack, draw 1 card. Whenever you play 2 Attacks in a row, lose 6 HP.
relics.flavorText: What did you expect from a pact with a Demon?
